item.title: Roblox: Vision Codes (November 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Vision Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Vision
  • How to Get More Vision Codes

Vision is a Roblox game for true football fans. Sixteen players will gather on a huge field and fight fiercely in a match for the right to be considered the best footballer. To win, you should know how to play well in a team, so the best solution is to call your friends. With them, it will be easier to complete challenges and earn in-game currency.

For UT, you can buy customization items and skills that, for example, can break through a block or deceive an opponent due to the unexpected trajectory of the ball. Completing challenges does not bring a lot of UT, so we recommend that you redeem Vision codes to get some extra currency for free.

Updated December 1, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Stay tuned for the latest updates to this guide. Codes are added regularly to help you improve your gaming experience.

All Vision Codes

Working Vision Codes

  • ZarNoMeta - Enter this code to get 1000 UT.
  • BUYPRIVATESERVER - Enter this code to get 1000 UT.
  • SAEEVENSTRONGER - Enter this code to get 1000 UT.
  • GOALKEEPERLOVE - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • HALLOWEEN - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • ITOSHISAE - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • NEWEFFECTS - Enter this code to get rewards.

Expired Vision Codes

  • SRRY4SHUTDOWN - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • GOALREACHED - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • SANS..? - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • 6MVISITS - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • GOAFK - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • 10KLIKES - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • HALLOWEENUPDATESOON - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • MOTHERâ€¦TRAIT? - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • 5MVISITS - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • UPDATESOON - Enter this code to get 5 Flow Spins and 5 SP Resets
  • SUPERSAIYAN - Enter this code to get 1000 UT
  • KAIOKEN - Enter this code to get 2 prod spins
  • 3MVISITS - Enter this code to get 1000 UT
  • 5000Likes - Enter this code to get 500 UT
  • 15KFavourites - Enter this code to get 2 prod spins, 5 flow spins, and 5 SP resets
  • 7500LIKES - Enter this code to get 1,000 UT
  • 4MVISITS - Enter this code to get 2 Prod Rolls
  • NAGICOUNTERTRAP - Enter this code to get rewards.
  • 2MVisits - Enter this code to get 1000 UT
  • 5000CCU - Enter this code to get 1000 UT, 1 Prod Spin, 1 Flow Spin, and 1 SP Reset
  • 10KFavourites - Enter this code to get 1000 UT
  • 1.5MVISITS - Enter this code to get 500 UT
  • 1MVISITS - Enter this code to get 1000 UT, 1 Prod Spin, SP Reset, 1 Flow Spin
  • 4000LIKES - Enter this code to get 1000 UT
  • ANNOYINGMATCHMAKING - Enter this code to get 1 Prod Spin, SP Reset, 1 Flow Spin
  • 4000CCU - Enter this code to get 1,000 UT
  • SORRY4SHUTDOWNS - Enter this code to get 2,000 UT and 2 Prodigy Spins
  • 3000CCU - Enter this code to get 500 UT
  • 2500LIKES - Enter this code to get 500 UT
  • 2000CCU - Enter this code to get 500 UT, 1 Prod Spin, and 1 SP Reset
  • 20KMEMBERS - Enter this code to get 2,000 UT
  • 2000LIKES - Enter this code to get 1,000 UT, 1 Prod Spins, 1 Flow Spins, and 1 SP Reset
  • 1500LIKES - Enter this code to get 500 UT
  • 1KLIKES - Enter this code to get 1,200 UT and 2 Prodigy Spins
  • 500LIKES - Enter this code to get 1,000 UT and 1 Prodigy Spin

Vision has a lot of skills and traits that can greatly strengthen you, especially if you know how to use them. But to get them, you need a lot of UT, and unfortunately, it takes a long time to farm this currency. Fortunately, you can redeem Vision codes and get UT for free. You will also get prodigy spins, but they work with a 1 in 10 chance, so you can only hope for luck.

How to Redeem Codes in Vision

Although the way codes are redeemed often differs from one Roblox game to another, it is usually quite easy to do. For example, in Vision , the Codes button is always in the interface, so most players will find it without any problems. However, if you still need help, you can use the guide below.

  • Open Roblox and launch Vision .
  • Press Play.
  • Look at the bottom of the screen. There you should find the blue Codes button. It is located above the Challenges button.
  • In the field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Redeem.

After redeeming the code, you will receive a notification with the rewards you have received. If there was no notification, then most likely you entered the code incorrectly, or it has expired.

How to Get More Vision Codes

Codes in Roblox games bring a lot of free rewards, so it's a good idea to bookmark this page. This will ensure that you get all the latest codes, as this guide will be updated regularly. You can also visit the official Vision Discord channel. There, you will find new codes, news about updates and events, as well as the opportunity to chat with other players.

item.title: STALKER 2: How To Get An AR416 Monolith Assault Rifle Early
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get an AR416 Monolith Assault Rifle Early in Stalker 2
  • Video Walkthrough on How to Get the AR416 Monolith Assault Rifle in Stalker 2

AR416 is one of the best and most hard-hitting assault rifles in Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl that players can get quite early in the game. Although most of the enemies get close to players and attack, it's easier to deal with most of them from a distance. Assault rifles turn out to be great weapons as they can shoot out a barrage of bullets with manageable recoil that shred enemies. Let's check out the way you can get the AR416 "Monolith" assault rifle early in Stalker 2 .

How to Get an AR416 Monolith Assault Rifle Early in Stalker 2

Players can find the AR416 "Monolith" assault rifle from a Journalist Cache inside the Sphere in Stalker 2 . Sphere is a military outpost located in the Lesser Zone region where Skiff confronts Solder in the "Beyond Seven Seals" main mission. However, players must be cautious while entering this installation as several soldiers are guarding it, even after completing the said mission.

Taking Down the Patrolling Soldiers

After entering through the northwest I.P.S.F outpost entrance, players must be wary of a couple of soldiers patrolling the outpost. It's difficult to sneak past them as, apparently, they can spot Skif very easily.

If a confrontation occurs, you must take down the soldiers first before trying to get to the Journalist Stash as it's in the open, and make Skif an easy target for soldiers.

Go up the Ladder & Open the Cache

Once all the soldiers are taken out, players will have some breathing roof before another wave of soldiers spawns. Quickly follow the left wall of the Sphere until you spot an I.P.S.F container. Behind said container, there's a rusted ladder leading to the roof of a small cabin.

After going up the stairs, players will spot the Journalist stash up ahead. Opening up the stash will get players the AR416 Monolith assault rifle and some ammo. After grabbing the stash, you should quickly make your escape from the sphere before another group of soldiers starts shooting at Skif.

How to Upgrade the AR416 Monolith Assault Rifle

It's a great assault rifle that players should upgrade from Diode at Slag Heap in the Garbage region. Trying to get it upgraded from Lens in Zalissya will give up a message, "The Technician cannot' install this upgrade." Another great thing about the A416 Monolith is that players can immediately use a Holo sight on it without worrying about installing a scope mount.

Video Walkthrough on How to Get the AR416 Monolith Assault Rifle in Stalker 2

item.title: Nintendo's Next Console Must Atone for One of the First Switch's Biggest Sins
item.description:
The Nintendo Switch brought a transformative experience to gaming with its hybrid design and expansive library of titles. Yet, despite its innovation, one significant flaw dampened its legacy: Joy-Con drift. This recurring issue caused controllers to register unintended inputs, leading to widespread frustration among players. For Nintendoâ€™s next console, fixing this problem is essential to secure player confidence and preserve its reputation.

Players began reporting Joy-Con drift shortly after the Switchâ€™s release. This hardware flaw stemmed from wear on the analog stick components, resulting in phantom movements or inputs. For a console built around its unique and detachable controllers, such a problem was a glaring oversight. Despite multiple updates to the Switch hardware over its lifespan, including the Switch OLED model, Nintendo never fully resolved the issue. It remained a constant source of complaints, litigation, and a blemish on an otherwise beloved system.

Joy-Con Drift Demands Nintendoâ€™s Full Attention

As Nintendo prepares for its next console, it cannot afford to repeat the mistakes of the Switch. Backward compatibility is widely speculated to be a feature of the upcoming system, meaning Joy-Consâ€”or a similar designâ€”are likely to remain integral. This makes solving Joy-Con drift a top priority.

Currently, the only alternative for frustrated players is to purchase and use the Pro Controller. While the Pro Controller is reliable, it undermines the Switchâ€™s core selling point: portability. This issue becomes especially pronounced in handheld mode, where Joy-Cons are the sole control method. The next generation must provide a durable, drift-free solution that supports the flexibility of the consoleâ€™s hybrid format.

There are technological advancements Nintendo could leverage to prevent drift entirely. Hall-effect sensors, for example, potentially eliminate the physical wear that causes drift by using magnetic fields to detect motion. Other companies have already adopted similar innovations, proving their viability in consumer electronics. If Nintendo is serious about hardware quality, it needs to incorporate these or similar technologies into its next-generation controllers.

Hardware Durability Can Rebuild Trust in Nintendo

Joy-Con drift did more than disrupt gameplayâ€”it eroded consumer confidence in Nintendoâ€™s hardware. The Switch gained a reputation for fragile controllers, a perception that has somewhat tarnished the companyâ€™s history of reliable designs. If Nintendo wants its next console to succeed without controversy, it must address this issue to restore trust among its players.

Reliable controllers not only improve the user experience but also reflect a commitment to quality. The Joy-Conâ€™s versatility was one of its greatest strengths, enabling features like motion controls, modular multiplayer, and unique accessories for games like Ring Fit Adventure . However, those strengths were overshadowed by their lack of durability. With a more robust design, Nintendo can expand on these capabilities without alienating players through recurring technical failures.

Additionally, improved controller reliability could inspire new gameplay innovations. The Joy-Con enabled unique experiences that distinguished the Switch from its competitors like Xbox and Playstation. By ensuring their successors are dependable, Nintendo can continue to push creative boundaries, offering players new ways to engage with games without compromising on hardware quality.

Nintendoâ€™s Next Console Is Its Redemption Arc

The new console is more than just a successor to the Switchâ€”it represents an opportunity for Nintendo to fix the past and set a new standard for the future. Joy-Con drift turned one of the most innovative controllers in gaming history into a liability for some Switch owners. It arguably created hesitancy among some players regarding the next console. To atone for this, Nintendo should release hardware that lives up to the expectations it set with the Switchâ€™s groundbreaking design.

Drift-free controllers would also help avoid the legal and financial fallout that plagued the Switch era. Class-action lawsuits and negative press somewhat damaged Nintendoâ€™s reputation, despite its proactive repair programs in some regions. By prioritizing hardware durability, Nintendo can eliminate this source of controversy entirely, allowing it to focus on showcasing the strengths of its next console. Ultimately, Nintendoâ€™s future hinges on learning from its missteps. The Switch changed the gaming industry by introducing a hybrid model that appealed to millions, and its successor has the potential to build on that legacy, provided it avoids being undermined by avoidable flaws.

item.title: Call Of Duty: Black Ops 6 - Best Weapons For The Skyline Map
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Weapon choice is crucial for success on the Skyline map, with each weapon best suited for specific playstyles and strategies.
  • The KSV SMG excels in close-range combat scenarios, while the AS VAL offers stealthy positioning and suppression.
  • The PP-919 SMG, Marine SP shotgun, and Tanto .22 are ideal for close-quarters combat, offering high damage output and accuracy.

In Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 , the Skyline map offers a thrilling and fast-paced battlefield that challenges players to adapt to diverse combat scenarios. From the high-ground second floor to tight corridors in the elevator shaft, space and zoning play a huge role in determining success on this map.

Weapon choice is crucial to dominating this luxury resort. Let's explore the best weapons for Skyline, each suited to specific playstyles and combat strategies, ensuring players can thrive on Skyline.

7 KSV

High-Performance SMG

  • Best used in rapid, close-range combat scenarios in tight indoor spaces like hallways and stairwells.
  • Unlock Level: 7

For players who live for in-your-face combat, KSV stands as a testament to quick shots and close-quarter gameplay. Fast-paced flanking maneuvers and aggressive pushes are no strangers to players who wield a KSV. This weapon thrives in tight corridors, long hallways and holding down rooms in the Skyline map, where speed and agility are paramount.

With fast handling and a high rate of fire, the KSV allows players to rush through hallways and blast through crowded enemy positions. The KSV allows players to move swiftly through the mapâ€™s multi-level environment while still maintaining accuracy in tight spaces. The SMG's damage output is enough to secure fast kills in close-quarters combat, and its compact design allows for easy movement between different floors of the mapâ€™s buildings.

6 AS VAL

Fast, Quiet Flanking

  • Best used in stealthy positioning and suppression of enemy players.
  • Unlock Level: 55

The AS VAL is a versatile assault rifle with an integrated suppressor, making it a strong choice for players who prefer stealthy engagements. It excels in mid-range combat and is particularly effective in Skylineâ€™s varied environments, whether players are fighting indoors or outside.

Its low recoil and high rate of fire make it a reliable weapon for both aggressive players and those who prefer to stay on the move. The suppressor keeps players silent, giving the edge in high-traffic areas where positioning is key.

5 PP-919

Close Range For The Win

  • Best used in objective control.
  • Unlock Level: 37

The PP-919 is a high-rate-of-fire SMG that shines in close-quarters combat. With its excellent mobility, low recoil, and solid damage, itâ€™s ideal for players who want to stay on the move while suppressing enemies with rapid fire. The Skyline map has plenty of spatial movement, with players constantly climbing and dropping between the upstairs corridor and by the pool. The PP-919â€™s ability to maintain accuracy and high output in tight areas makes it perfect for aggressive, mobile playstyles.

Players can argue that reloading is a bit slow on base PP-919, but its decent damage and magazine capacity make up for it, keeping players pounding out bullets at enemies throughout the game.

4 Marine SP

One Shot Glock

  • Best used in fast-paced, aggressive gameplay focusing on high-damage, one-shot kills.
  • Base Game Unlock

For those who prefer close-range, hard-hitting encounters, the Marine SP shotgun is a top contender on the Skyline map. Its devastating power makes it perfect for clearing upper (or lower) rooms and holding down tight chokepoints, especially in building interiors.

The close-quarters combat opportunities in Skyline make this shotgun a deadly choice for aggressive players who want to dominate tight spaces. Perfect for Free-For-All or Team Deathmatch, the Marine SP is a sufficient way to eliminate enemies without even knowing what hit them. Ambushing opponents as they enter the lower level of the mansion, the Marine SP stands as a deadly choice that ensures players dominate close-range engagements easily.

3 Tanto .22

Heavy Hitter

  • Best used in surprise flanking.
  • Unlock Level: 16

The Tanto .22 might have a slow fire rate compared to other SMGs, but when equipped with the right attachments, it can become one of the most devastating close-range weapons in Black Ops 6 . Its strong damage output and precision make it a perfect fit for players who value accuracy and stopping power. On the Skyline map, where tight corners, stairwells, and indoor engagements are common, the Tanto .22 can dominate the match when set up properly.

Players will find that the Tanto .22 benefits greatly from underbarrel grips and no stock. These attachments help reduce recoil, making it easier to maintain accuracy when firing those hard-hitting shots.

2 Saug

Objective Control And Rushing Enemies

  • Best used for sustained fire, key to overwhelming opponents.
  • Unlock Season 1 Battle Pass, Page 3

Recently released in Black Ops 6 Season 1 Battle Pass, the Saug is an exciting unlock for players who progress through the season. Its smooth handling, high rate of fire and manageable recoil make it a top choice on Skyline, where the map encourages quick, fluid movements and varied combat.

Players will often find themselves navigating the pool deck area, inside lower rooms, or rushing through enemies holding down the upper hallway, the Saug shines in all these spaces thanks to its flexibility in close-quarters engagements and its ability to handle mid-range combat with ease. Its lightweight frame and quick handling let players move efficiently without losing effectiveness in combat.

1 XM4

Versatility Is Key: Mid-Range And Close Combat

  • Best used in offensive pushes and defensive holds.
  • Base Game Unlock

The XM4 is an assault rifle that has earned its reputation as one of the most well-rounded and consistently effective weapons in Black Ops 6 . As a base game weapon, it's available right from the start, but that doesnâ€™t make it any less deadly. The XM4â€™s versatility and balanced stats make it a top-tier weapon that can hold its own against other specialized weapons in the game. Whether players engage enemies in tight indoor spaces or engage targets across more spacious open areas on Skyline, the XM4 proves to be one of the most adaptable weapons in the arsenal.

Shining in mid-range engagements, its consistent recoil pattern and decent fire rate allow for steady, accurate shots at opponents, giving players access to an easy win. Thanks to its steady recoil control and decent ADS (aim down sight) speed, the XM4 is a great weapon for quickly transitioning, staying competitive, and clearing rooms.

item.title: Pokemon GO Player Has Ridiculous Luck After Using Adventure Incense
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Rare shiny Galarian birds are easier to catch during Daily Adventure Incense session, and one player proved it.
  • They caught Articuno and Moltres during just one 15-minute walk, showing off their new Legendary shinies on social media.

One lucky Pokemon GO player recently hit the jackpot while going on a Daily Adventure Incense walk, netting both their first and second catches from the legendary Galarian bird trio. The Galarian birds and the Daily Adventure Incese share a close connection in Pokemon GO , but encountering two of the legendary creatures in one session is almost unheard of.

The Daily Adventure Incense in Pokemon GO is a feature that players can activate once a day. First launched in July 2022, the feature opens a 15-minute window in which new, and sometimes rare, Pokemon will continue to appear on the map for the item's duration. Unlike normal incense, however, Daily Adventure Incense only works if the player stays moving continuously, and players have reported that moving greater distances within the allotted timeframe has resulted in the appearance of more Pokemon.

One player, who goes by the Reddit handle SpiderPigNYC and represents Pokemon GO 's Team Mystic, recently shared an image of their haul from one 15-minute walk, which netted them a hefty haul of 15 different Pokemon. Among that number were two legendaries: a shiny Galarian Articuno and a shiny Galarian Moltres. While the player has encountered members of the Galaraian bird trio in the past while playing Pokemon GO, the Pokemon had always run away from the battle, making the double catch during one Daily Adventure Incense session all the more special for them.

Lucky Pokemon GO Player Nabs Two Shiny Galarian Birds in 15 Minutes

There is a logical reason why these were the first Galarian birds to not run away from the player. Pokemon GO initially released the Galarian birds a few years ago, but players complained en masse that their catch rates made them incredibly difficult to obtain, and the birds would often flee when encountered in the wild before a player could successfully get one into a Poke Ball. With that criticism in mind, Niantic actually made catching shiny Galarian birds in Pokemon GO easier than catching their normally colored counterparts. The shiny versions of Galarian Articuno, Zapdos, and Moltres only appear when a player is using their Daily Adventure Incense, and while their catch rate difficulty hasn't been decreased, they lack the ability to run from encounters with players.

While using a Daily Adventure Incense is the only way to encounter shiny Galarian birds, there are plenty of other rare Pokemon that can be found through other methods. Niantic recently made one of these methods easier for players, releasing a surprise upgrade to Pokemon GO remote raid passes that simplifies the matchmaking process of assembling a team to take on some of the game's toughest Pokemon.
